overview:
Dave Jackson is the Chief Revenue Officer for Grab Media, a distributed media company that licenses and distributes professionally-produced brand name video content broadly across the web.

Dave is one of the founding members of the Grab Media team and has helped drive it to a top 25 online media company as measured by VideoMetrix.

Prior to Grab Dave was at AOL from 2000-2008 as VP, Advertising Sales in the Key Accounts Division. He managed the business with P&G, Coca-Cola, General Mills among others.

Before AOL Dave was at the Washington Post - Traditional newspaper side as Director of Marketing Communications.
